summary: Federal grants to state and local governments totaled over $674 billion in FY 2017. The number of grant programs across federal agencies has increased in recent years, as has the level of funding, which has led to a more complex federal grant management process. title: Grants Management: Observations on Challenges and Opportunities for Reform
